overview: With a cultural background of Bangka Belitung and the nuances of Eid al-Fitr, this film tells the story of a romantic romantic religious drama about the simplicity of love that offers elements of peace conveyed in Islam and Malay culture through the proven bond of a man when leaving. hometown named Malik Ahmad towards a woman named Mariam Syahida who has extraordinary loyalty.
title: 7 Purnama di Satu Syawal
